chara.textHome: I'm in charge of student discipline.

When I warn the students, my friends say
"there you go lecturing again"
but I'm not trying to lecture anyone...

It's just that when morals break down,
minds do too. So I do it to keep order
in the school...
Ah, sorry. Am I lecturing you?

I hit my personal best time in my
last swimming competition!

When I compare it to the other swimmers'
times, I think I might stand a good chance
of ranking in the next rookie's contest...
*Giggle*
Nice! This is going great!
I have to remember how this feels!
Ahhh...what a rush!
My mind feels so clear now!

I want to become something that
can correct what is wrong.

Something that can help out
those who are suffering from
the evil actions of others...

I was scared of hunting Witches,
to be honest.

But joining a team where the others fight
so close to me helps.

Now I don't flinch at anything,
even when facing a Witch head-on!

Sometimes I even think, 
"If only we could fight together forever",
you know?
It took you long enough.

What in the world were you up to?
Come on, let's go on patrol.
Haruka and the others are waiting.

Good morning!
Did you wash your face?
Eat your breakfast?

Do your homework?
Have everything?
All right, looks like you're all set.
We're good to go!
It's almost lunchtime.

However, troublemakers like Arisa will
try to eat early, so it's too soon for the
person in charge of discipline to relax.

I have swimming practice, so you
can head home without me...

But if you're interested, you're welcome
to come see what practice is like.
Want to come?

Tomorrow is my day to do morning
greetings with Haruka.

I've got to get up earlier than usual,
so it'd be a good idea to head to bed.

Even the worst troublemakers at school
are dealing with their own issues...
I try to take that into account.
After what's happened...

I was talking with the others about
stepping up our patrols.
Speaking of that! Let's go on one right now.
This place is quite unsettling...
Wh-what?! I am not afraid.

Situations like this must be dealt
with calmly.

Teaming up with Haruka made
me realize something...

Even things you can't do alone can
be done with friends at your side.

Arisa sleeps in a lot, so I go make
sure she gets up on time.
She just can't follow a healthy routine...

Hey, what do you think I should be
in the future?

I can't let misconduct slide, so maybe
a police officer? Or a judge?
Haruka is so amazing!

Not only is she smart, witty, and kind,
everyone depends on her...
She's everything I want to be.

I live together with my dad.
I'm in charge of housework.

Hm? No, it's not hard at all.
I like doing it, and my dad helps me out!
So, do you like picture books?

I see... I used to read them all the time
when I was young.

Picture books, they fill young readers
with dreams of their own...

My dad always dreamed of illustrating
picture books, and his dream came
true, but...he ended up quitting.

It was me who made him give up on
his dream...
I felt so guilty about what I did to my dad.
I always regretted it...
But what Arisa told me made me feel better.
I was so, so happy...

No. I won't let you get by with some
lame excuse!

Now, how should I teach you your lesson
for skipping out on your cleaning duties?
Hee hee!
Give me your best shot!
Whew... All finished.
I'm glad you got my point.
This is because we worked as a team!
*Sigh* That was fast!

Pleased to meet you!
I am Chisato Shion.
And it's time for a surprise student check!
Ah, your tie is crooked...
There we go, all fixed!
I feel I've gotten stronger than I used to be.
But of course, I must keep getting stronger!
I never thought I'd make it this far!
This is all because of our amazing hard work!
*Giggle*

I'm more in sync with the others
than I used to be.
Let's keep up the good work!
I'm part of the swimming club.
Why did I pick that club?

Well, I'm not very good at sports on land,
so...

The most fun I have swimming is when
I reach the goals I set for myself.

It's hard to beat the feeling of all your hours
 of practice paying off!
